Package org.liquidengine.legui.component

Class TextAreaField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liquidengine.legui.component.Component
      • org.liquidengine.legui.component.TextAreaField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, TextComponent
    public class TextAreaField
extends Component
implements TextComponent
    TextAreaField is multiline text component which allow to enter text.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected TextState textState
      Used to hold text state of text area.
